patterns: tell me some history or interesting facts
can you tell me some history facts?
responses: The Great Wall of China is not a single continuous wall but rather a series of walls that were built over the course of 2000 years by different Chinese dynasties to protect against invaders
The ancient Egyptians used a system of hieroglyphics which were symbols that represented words and sounds to write on papyrus and inscribe on tombs and temples
The first known use of the wheel dates back to ancient Mesopotamia where it was used for transportation and agriculture around 3500 BC
The ancient Greeks are credited with inventing democracy which is a system of government where citizens have the right to participate in the decision-making process through voting
The Mayflower the ship that carried the Pilgrims to the New World in 1620 was only about 90 feet long and could hold about 180 people
The first known use of paper was in ancient Egypt where it was made from the papyrus plant
The ancient Romans were known for their sophisticated road-building techniques and the Roman road network was one of the most extensive in the world at the time
The first photograph was taken in 1826 by French inventor Joseph Nicéphore Niépce using a camera obscura and a sheet of paper coated with silver chloride
The first successful powered flight by a heavier-than-air machine took place on December 17 1903 when the Wright brothers' airplane flew for 12 seconds and covered a distance of 120 feet.
